attributes.action: restrict the numbers of cars owned per household
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be put forward that restrictions should be in place to restrict the number of cars per household where a property has no off road parking.  At present car parking is becoming a problem nationwide and can lead to accidents in narrow streets, so a limitation of one car per household in areas where parking restrictions exist would help compact parking and accident problems.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
